inclusion.criterion: aged 18 year or older with GFR 15-60ml/min calculated by MDRD formula
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Serum creatinine levels more than 8mg/dl or GFR less than 15ml/min
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Change in serum creatinine levels of ³0.5mg/dl during the previous 24 hours.
exclusion.label: unknown
